name: Fiendish Word
summary: You can call forth a blasphemous word from the fiendish realms to punish your foes.
description:
You can call forth a blasphemous word from the fiendish realms to punish your foes. Once per day, you can cast divine decree as a 7th-level divine innate spell. You must choose evil for the spell, and you can Cast the Spell regardless of whether you have a deity or what their alignment is.Traits

Tiefling: A creature with this trait has the tiefling versatile heritage. Tieflings are planar scions descended from fiends. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tieflings.
